argument.name: options
argument.desc: A map of additional options to pass to the method.

property.name: duration
property.desc: A string or number determining how long the animation will run.

property.name: easing
property.desc: A string indicating which easing function to use for the transition.

property.name: complete
property.desc: A function to call once the animation is complete.

property.name: step
property.desc: A function to be called after each step of the animation for each animated element and for each animated property.

argument.name: now
argument.desc: The numeric value of the property being animated at each step

argument.name: fx
argument.desc: A map of properties related to the animation and the element being animated

property.name: start
property.desc: The first value of the animated property

property.name: end
property.desc: The last value of the animated property

property.name: queue
property.desc: A Boolean indicating whether to place the animation in the effects queue. If false, the animation will begin immediately. As of jQuery 1.7, the queue option can also accept a string, in which case the animation is added to the queue represented by that string.

property.name: specialEasing
property.desc: A map of one or more of the CSS properties defined by the properties argument and their corresponding easing functions.

property.name: progress
property.desc: A function to be called after each step of the animation, only once per animated element regardless of the number of animated properties.

argument.name: animation
argument.desc: An enhanced Promise oject with additional properties for the animation

argument.name: progress
argument.desc: A number from 0 to 1 indicating the progress of the animation

argument.name: remainingMs
argument.desc: A number indicating the remaining number of milliseconds until the end of the animation

property.name: done
property.desc: A function to be called when the animation completes (its Promise object is resolved).

argument.name: animation
argument.desc: An enhanced Promise oject with additional properties for the animation

argument.name: jumpedToEnd
argument.desc: Indicates whether the animation jumped to the end

property.name: fail
property.desc: A function to be called when the animation fails to complete (its Promise object is rejected).

argument.name: animation
argument.desc: An enhanced Promise oject with additional properties for the animation

argument.name: jumpedToEnd
argument.desc: Indicates whether the animation jumped to the end

property.name: always
property.desc: A function to be called when the animation completes or stops without completing (its Promise object is either resolved or rejected).

argument.name: animation
argument.desc: An enhanced Promise oject with additional properties for the animation

argument.name: jumpedToEnd
argument.desc: Indicates whether the animation jumped to the end
